Description: The St Kilda Historical Society Incorporated is a remarkable charity dedicated to the preservation, celebration, and protection of LGBTQ+ history and individuals within the community. Founded on the principles of diversity, inclusivity, and respect, this organization plays a crucial role in safeguarding the heritage of LGBTQ+ people while fostering an environment of acceptance for all.

The Trustee for ISG Foundation is a compassionate and dedicated charity with a primary focus on safeguarding the well-being and future of children. With an unwavering commitment to creating a world where every child can thrive, the foundation works tirelessly to provide essential support, resources, and advocacy to ensure the protection and development of young lives.

Singleton Equality is a remarkable charity dedicated to promoting inclusivity, accessibility, and empowerment for disabled individuals. With a firm commitment to dismantling barriers and fostering a more equitable society, Singleton Equality works tirelessly to improve the quality of life for people with disabilities, championing their rights, aspirations, and contributions.

The Geraldine Foundation is a dynamic and impactful charity that is deeply committed to the transformational power of education. With a resolute dedication to enhancing educational opportunities, breaking down barriers, and empowering individuals of all backgrounds, this foundation plays a vital role in shaping a brighter and more equitable future for learners around the world.

Gethsemane Community is a compassionate and dedicated charity with a profound commitment to improving the lives of Aboriginal individuals and communities. Rooted in a deep respect for Indigenous cultures, histories, and aspirations, the organization works tirelessly to address the unique challenges faced by Aboriginal people and to create pathways toward a brighter future
